TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DrawingGroup extends System.Windows.Media.Drawing
Public NotInheritable Class DrawingGroup Inherits Drawing
public ref class DrawingGroup sealed : System::Windows::Media::Drawing

summary.span: 表示可以作为单个绘图进行运算的绘图集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of drawings that can be operated upon as a single drawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用合并到一个组合的绘图的多个绘图。Use a to combine multiple drawings into a single, composite drawing. 与其他不同对象，可以将应用， ，设置， ， ，或者到。Unlike other objects, you can apply a , , setting, , , or a to a . 此类的灵活性，可创建复杂的场景。The flexibility of this class enables you to create complex scenes. 因为也是，它可以包含其他对象。Because is also a , it can contain other objects. 有关详细信息对象，请参阅[Drawing 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see [Drawing Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md). **Freezable 功能：** 因为它继承自类，类提供多种特殊功能：可以声明为在多个对象之间共享、 变为只读以提高性能、 克隆，并变为线程安全对象。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关所提供的不同功能的详细信息对象，请参阅[Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置要应用于此 的 。

The to apply to this .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关位图效果以及它们如何工作的详细信息，请参阅[位图效果概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/bitmap-effects-overview.md)。For more information about bitmap effects and how they work, see [Bitmap Effects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/bitmap-effects-overview.md). 操作将按以下顺序应用： operations are applied in the following order: - - - - - ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 此示例演示如何将应用到绘图。This example shows how to apply a to a drawing. 使用模糊不清或浮现出来，或将应用到其他视觉效果呈现的内容。Use a to blur or emboss, or to apply other visual effects to rendered content. 仅对象支持位图效果。Only objects support bitmap effects. 要应用于的另一种类型的位图效果对象，将其添加到并设置属性的对象。To apply a bitmap effect to another type of object, add it to a and set the property of the object. > [!NOTE] > Windows Presentation Foundation 位图效果是呈现的软件。Windows Presentation Foundation bitmap effects are software rendered. 应用的所有对象还在软件中呈现。Any object that applies a is also rendered in the software. 避免使用在大型视觉对象或动画因为这种情况下可能会导致系统性能降低。Avoid using a in large visuals or animations because this scenario can cause a decrease in system performance. 下面的示例使用以应用到多个对象。The following example uses a to apply a to several objects. 下图显示了此示例的输出。The following illustration shows the output from this example. ![具有 BlurBitmapEffect 的 DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-bitmap.png "具有 BlurBitmapEffect 的 DrawingGroup")![DrawingGroup with a BlurBitmapEffect](~/add/media/graphicsmm-bitmap.png "DrawingGroup with a BlurBitmapEffect") [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupBitmapEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/BitmapEffectExample.cs#drawinggroupbitmapeffectexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupBitmapEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/BitmapEffectExample.xaml#drawinggroupbitmapeffectexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Z 顺序中的子项由子项目中的顺序决定的。The z-order of the child items in a is determined by the order of the child items in the of the . 绘制每个子级是在集合中的下一个子级。Each child drawing is under the next child in the collection. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

member this.ClipGeometry : System.Windows.Media.Geometry with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的剪裁区域。

span.span: Gets or sets the clip region of this .
The that is used to clip this .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 几何图形外的绘图将被剪裁掉呈现时。Drawings outside the geometry are clipped from the when it is rendered. 几何图形不一定要矩形;例如，可以使用裁剪到椭圆的形状。The geometry does not have to be rectangular; for example, you can use an to clip to an elliptical shape. 操作将按以下顺序应用： operations are applied in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 此示例演示如何定义的剪辑区域。This example shows how to define a clip region for a . 使用定义的剪辑。Use a to define a clip for a . 类是唯一的类型使您能够定义您自己的剪辑区域的对象。The class is the only type of object that enables you to define your own clip region. 使用来描述该剪辑并将其应用于属性的对象。Use a to describe the clip and apply it to the property of the object. 图所示之前和之后应用的椭圆的剪辑。The illustration shows the before and after the elliptical clip is applied. ![具有定义的剪辑区域的 DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-clipgeom.png "具有定义的剪辑区域的 DrawingGroup")![DrawingGroup with a defined clip region](~/add/media/graphicsmm-clipgeom.png "DrawingGroup with a defined clip region") 下面的示例使用以应用到多个对象。The following example uses a to apply a to several objects. [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupClipGeometryExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/ClipExample.cs#drawinggroupclipgeometryexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupClipGeometryExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/ClipExample.xaml#drawinggroupclipgeometryexamplewholepage)]

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改深层副本，并制作其值的深层副本。

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，克隆对象的 属性仍会返回

span.span: The property of the cloned object returns even if the property of the source is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法生成的只读的可修改副本对象。Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only objects. 为方便起见，此方法隐藏继承的版本使用的强类型实现。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 此方法复制依赖项属性时，它将复制资源引用和数据绑定，但它们可能不再解析。When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings even though they might no longer resolve. 不复制动画或其当前值。It does not copy animations or their current values. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法生成的只读的可修改副本对象。Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only objects. 为方便起见，此方法隐藏继承的版本使用的强类型实现。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 此方法不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，但复制其当前值。This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Opacity : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的不透明度。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity of this .

value.span: 介于 0 和 1 之间（包括 0 和 1）的值，用于描述此 的不透明度。

span.span: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that describes the opacity of this .
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为`1`规定完全不透明; 值为`0`指定它是完全透明。A value of `1` specifies that the is completely opaque; a value of `0` specifies that it is completely transparent. 小于 0 被视为 0，而大于 1 的值是某个值视为 1。A value that is less than 0 is treated as 0, and a value that is larger than 1 is treated as 1. 另一种方法来控制的不透明度是指定的其。Another way to control the opacity of a is to specify the of its . 操作将按以下顺序应用： operations are applied in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 此示例演示如何修改的不透明度。This example shows how to modify the opacity of a . 类是唯一的类型对象，它具有属性。The class is the only type of object that has an property. 若要更改的不透明度对象，将其添加到并设置属性的对象。To change the opacity of a object, add it to a and set the property of the object. 设置为对象乘以其子绘图; 的不透明度例如，如果具有0.5 和它的包含具有 50%不透明，画笔为 25%不透明 (0.5 \* 0.5)。The setting of the object is multiplied by the opacity of its child drawings; for example, if a has an of 0.5 and it contains a that has a 50 percent opaque , the brush is 25 percent opaque (0.5 \* 0.5). 若要更改的选择部分绘图的不透明度，使用。To alter the opacity of select portions of a drawing, use an . 下面的示例使用组合了几个对象。The following example uses a to combine several objects. 该示例还设置的不透明度对象为 0.25，以便绘图是不透明的 25%。The example also sets the opacity of the object to 0.25 so that the drawings are 25 percent opaque. 此图显示了之前和之后其设置为 0.25。This illustration shows the before and after its is set to 0.25. ![使用不同不透明度设置的 Drawinggroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opacity.png "具有不同不透明度设置的 Drawinggroup")![DrawingGroups with different opacity settings](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opacity.png "DrawingGroups with different opacity settings") [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupOpacityExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/OpacityExample.cs#drawinggroupopacityexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupOpacityExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/OpacityExample.xaml#drawinggroupopacityexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ OpacityMask { System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ value); };
member this.OpacityMask : System.Windows.Media.Brush with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于改变此 的选区不透明度的画笔。

span.span: Gets or sets the brush used to alter the opacity of select regions of this .

value.span: 描述此 透明度的 ； 指示不存在不透明蒙板且不透明度统一。

span.span: A that describes the opacity of this ; indicates that no opacity mask exists and the opacity is uniform.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到。The is mapped to the . 映射的每个像素的不透明度值用于确定生成的每个相应像素的不透明度。The opacity value of each pixel of the mapped is used to determine the resulting opacity of each corresponding pixel of the . 画笔中每种颜色的不透明度值用于这种处理;将忽略所有其他颜色信息。Only the opacity value of each color in the brush is used for this processing; all other color information is ignored. 用乘以此属性指定的不透明度的值对象。The opacity that this property specifies is multiplied with the value of the object. 有关不透明蒙板和它们的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[不透明蒙板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md)。For more information about opacity masks and how they work, see [Opacity Masks Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md). 操作将按以下顺序应用： operations are applied in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 此示例演示如何将应用到不透明蒙板。This example shows how to apply an opacity mask to a . 类是唯一的类型支持不透明蒙板的对象。The class is the only type of object that supports opacity masks. 若要应用到不透明蒙对象，将其添加到并设置属性的对象。To apply an opacity mask to a object, add it to a and set the property of the object. 下图显示了三个视图的： 绘制不透明蒙板，独立的不透明蒙板和应用不透明蒙板后。The following illustration shows three views of the : the drawing without an opacity mask, the opacity mask alone, and the after the opacity mask is applied. ![具有不透明蒙版的 DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opmask.png "具有不透明蒙版的 DrawingGroup")![A DrawingGroup with an opacity mask](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opmask.png "A DrawingGroup with an opacity mask") 下面的示例使用用作不透明蒙板的。The following example uses a as an opacity mask for a . > [!NOTE] > 虽然此示例使用用作不透明蒙板， ， ，和对象还可以进行良好的不透明蒙板。Although this example uses a as an opacity mask, , , , and objects can also make good opacity masks. 有关不透明蒙板和它们的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[不透明蒙板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md)。For more information about opacity masks and how they work, see the [Opacity Masks Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md). [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupOpacityMaskExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/OpacityMaskExample.cs#drawinggroupopacitymaskexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupOpacityMaskExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/OpacityMaskExample.xaml#drawinggroupopacitymaskexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将多个转换应用于单个，使用。To apply multiple transforms to a single , use a . 操作将按以下顺序应用： operations are applied in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 此示例演示如何将应用到。This example shows how to apply a to a . 若要转换对象，您将其添加到并设置属性的对象。To transform a object, you add it to a and set the property of the object. 类是唯一的类型支持转换的对象。The class is the only type of object that supports transforms. 若要将多个转换应用于单个，使用。To apply multiple transforms to a single , use a . 下面的示例使用来合并多个对象，然后将它们转换使用。The following example uses a to combine several objects and then transforms them by using a . 图所示之前和之后应用。The illustration shows the before and after the is applied. ![旋转后的 DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-rotate.png "旋转后的 DrawingGroup")![A rotated DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-rotate.png "A rotated DrawingGroup") [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupTransformExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/TransformExample.cs#drawinggrouptransformexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupTransformExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/TransformExample.xaml#drawinggrouptransformexamplewholepage)]

summary.span: 标识 依赖项属性。
